title: Every Other Weekend
description: It was only meant to be every other weekend. But now I need him every night.As a single mom, a relationship was out of the question. So we had an arrangement.The first every other weekend. But that wasn't enough.The second he can't meet my son. But he did, and they got along.The third I won't fall in love. But I couldn't help it.The final I'll never let anyone else break my heart.And now that rule is about to be broken too. Now a Top 40 ebook in the ENTIRE Kindle Store! Top 10 Kindle Romance, Contemporary Romance, & Top 5 New Adult Romance! Thank you readers!Darlin' - this is a full length 90,000 word novel with a single mother, a second chance romance, and a complete HEA, no cliffhanger ending that will make you never forget Jordyn or Ramsey. Thanks for taking a chance on me and this novel.
author: Jaxson Kidman
